name: LiveContainer + SideStore (nightly)
subtitle: LiveContainer + SideStore
description:
This is an unofficial AltStore Source for LiveContainer + SideStore (nightly).

 Run iOS apps without actually installing them!

apps.name: LiveContainer + SideStore (nightly)
apps.subtitle: Run iOS apps without actually installing them!
apps.versionDescription:
Nightly build from [14c370b](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/14c370b): Fix 1047

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/20401832822/attempts/1).
apps.localizedDescription: Run iOS apps without actually installing them!

versions.localizedDescription:
Nightly build from [14c370b](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/14c370b): Fix 1047

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/20401832822/attempts/1).
versions.headline: Fix #1047

apps.headline: Fix #1047

permissions.usageDescription: SideStore requires access to the local network to communicate with nearby devices.
SideStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows SideStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: #StandWithUkraine
news.caption: Find out how you can help support those impacted by the Russian invasion.

news.caption: A new version has released with new features and stability improvements!

news.caption: Check out the Documentation for more info
